Name: Pray And Spray
About the game: Pray And Spray is an online first person action shooter. Place yourself right in the center of warfare! Aliens vs. humans! Multiple game modes! Operate vehicles. Play with your friends or battle against them. Fight against bots or random online players. Customize your loadouts with over 25+ weapons to choose from. Battle it out on the most realistic and bizarre levels! Step into the arena today and show off your skills!
